content: the sooner you simply let this go the way the oak tree lets the acorn shell go, the better. cus this sort of communique to you will morph, from thing to thing and issue to issue…because it is expressive of a certain sort of “entity” or “spirit” (not a demon) that will always afflict someone who writes about what you write about. Be unconcerned with them…literally. Just say “thank you for your input” and move on. I am old…and I have seen this for a long time. just do you…it’s good
